This modern Cape Country Manor House offers the ideal base from which to explore Knysna & the surrounding area of the Garden Route, including its rich forests, endless lakes & gorgeous beaches.
Guests can anticipate authentic hospitality in a spacious & serene environment.  The restaurant, cocktail bar & sundeck offer lovely indoor & outdoor dining experiences.

Knysna Hollow Country Estate features 44 luxury garden suites situated in the indigenous gardens around 2 sparkling swimming pools.
Each room is decorated in a clean, contemporary style with a private garden-facing veranda where relaxing afternoons can be spent reading a book or gazing at the lush surroundings.
The estate is also home to a fitness centre & swimming pool.  Meals are served in the restaurant or outdoor deck while delicious cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar.

title: KURLAND
description:
Kurland is an elegant country hotel set on a private polo estate between Knysna & Plettenberg Bay along the renowned Garden Route.
Family-owned & run, Kurland is all about exceptional service, beautiful suites, sublime local cuisine & family-friendly activities, including horse-riding & quad biking on the estate.
With an ideal location in the heart of the Garden Route, guests will be close to some of the area’s top attractions, including The Elephant Sanctuary, Birds of Eden, Monkeyland & the beautiful Nature’s Valley with its scenic forest trails.
Families will fall in love with Kurland since there is ample space for the little ones to run around & a variety of exciting activities to choose from.  There is also a dedicated Kids Club area & a swimming pool.  Kids meals can also be arranged & trained nannies are also available.  
Children of all ages are welcome at Kurland.

Kurland has 12 tastefully decorated, spacious suites & can accommodate up to 48 people.  
The luxury & superior suites all have private loft rooms that are specially furnished for children with their own en-suite bathrooms.  The luxury suites have secluded courtyards & water features while the superior suites all have private pools, which enjoy magnificent views of the estate.
Communal areas include a polo pavilion complete with a restaurant, bar & children’s playroom.  There is also a wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.   The relaxing lounge, dining room with fireplace & outdoor patio area are ideal for relaxing & the swimming pool with sun loungers invite guests to relax after a day of exploration.

title: LEISURE ISLE LODGE
description:
Situated on a tiny island in Knysna Lagoon, right at the heart of the Garden Route, you will find Leisure Isle Lodge – a charming guesthouse that sits alongside cosy beach cottages.
Offering beautiful views of the Knysna Lagoon, the elegant restaurant & outdoor pool area is a wonderful place to relax in the sun after a day of exploration.
This intimate guesthouse offers great service, along with a friendly home-away-from-home atmosphere that attracts couples, friends & families alike.
Just across the road, you will find a lovely little stretch of beach – a serene slice of paradise that welcomes guests to stroll along its soft, powdery sand or take a refreshing dip in the warm, lagoon.

Small & intimate, Leisure Isle Lodge only offers 10 rooms & a penthouse, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The rooms consist of garden or lagoon facing rooms, each beautifully decorated.  The penthouse boasts a private balcony overlooking the lagoon, a lounge & dining area with a fireplace as well as an open patio with lagoon views.
Leisure Isle Lodge has a lovely private swimming pool & a wellness spa as well as a stylish lounge & bar area that looks out over the Knysna Lagoon.  Their award-winning Daniela’s Restaurant is positioned overlooking Bollard Bay & the lagoon.

title: NR 5 BOUTIQUE ART HOTEL
description:
Nr 5 Boutique Art Hotel is set within an upscale neighbourhood in Port Elizabeth, an easy stroll from Summerstrand – one of the best beaches in the area.  
Small & intimate, this boutique hotel offers friendly & personalized service & a variety of modern facilities such as a wellness spa, a fitness centre & a restaurant serving fine cuisine.
This hotel offers relaxation for mind & body.  Guests can stroll through the landscaped gardens or along the beach – especially after a lengthy self-drive vacation along the scenic Garden Route.
Nr 5 Boutique Art Hotel is the perfect stop-over for guests who are travelling to Addo Elephant Park in the Eastern Cape or who are connecting with a flight back to Johannesburg or Cape Town.

Accommodation comprises 3 luxury suites, 3 business suites, 1 presidential suite & 1 three-bedroom villa.  
The spacious luxury suites feature a separate lounge & private garden while the business suites have their own balconies.  The presidential suite boasts a private lounge & terrace as well as an en-suite bathroom with a separate bath & shower. 
The villa consists of 3 en-suite bedrooms, a lounge & dining area, a fully furnished kitchen as well as a wooden deck with a swimming pool.
At the main lodge, you will find a restaurant, bar, gym, wellness spa & swimming pool.

title: PEZULA RESORT HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Pezula Resort Hotel & Spa is an award-winning golf resort with a dramatic location set on a cliff overlooking the beautiful Knysna lagoon to the north & the Outeniqua Mountains in the distance.
The resort is home to an 18-hole Pezula Championship Golf Course & offers a range of other family-friendly activities like horse-riding, tennis, cycling, mountain biking while yachting, kayaking, diving & fishing can also be arranged.
Pezula’s exceptional on-site restaurants offer delicious cuisine that ranges from beach picnics to light meals & sophisticated dining.

Accommodation comprises 76 suites in total.  These include deluxe suites, luxury suites, superior suites, inter-leading family suites, 2-bedroom villas & an opulent presidential suite.
Deluxe suites boast private patios or balconies with garden views & cosy sitting areas while the larger luxury suites are located on the upper or lower levels & feature scenic golf course or garden views.
Superior suites have sitting areas & lagoon or golf course views while inter-leading family suites sleep 4 people in 2 bedrooms.  Two-bedroom villas have magnificent golf course & ocean views, private patios, plunge pools & separate living, dining & kitchen areas.  The opulent presidential suite offers only the best in 5-star luxury.
Resort facilities include a swimming pool, spa, bar, gym, library, restaurant & tennis court.

title: RADISSON BLU HOTEL PORT ELIZABETH
description:
The Radisson Blu Hotel Port Elizabeth is situated only 300 meters from the blue flag beaches of Algoa Bay – widely regarded as boasting some of the best beaches in the country & a paradise for watersport enthusiasts.
Port Elizabeth is more than just their beaches.  The seaside town is home to a variety of good restaurants, museums & monuments as well as a wonderful overnight destination after a Garden Route holiday or en-route to Addo Elephant Park.
Guests can enjoy rejuvenating treatments at the wellness spa or take a dip in the gorgeous swimming pool overlooking the beach.

The hotel comprises 173 rooms & suites, each with air-conditioning & en-suite bathroom.  
Superior rooms are comfortably furnished & have everything you need for a relaxing stay.  There are also superior ocean view rooms offering breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean & premier sea-facing rooms boasting more space as well as ocean views.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar & lounge as well as a wellness spa & beautiful swimming pool with glorious views of the beach.

title: TAMODI LODGE &amp; STABLES
description:
Tamodi Lodge enjoys an idyllic setting on a working equestrian farm within a private nature reserve just outside the sought-after seaside town of Plettenberg Bay.
Here, guests will enjoy jaw-dropping views of the surrounding mountains in a serene setting.  
Just around the corner & a short drive away, you will find Plettenberg Bay with its blue flag beaches & a long list of activities, including seasonal whale watching, water sports, golf & wine tasting.
The area is particularly good for hiking & mountain biking, so nature-lovers will feel like they are in paradise.
Since the lodge only has 7 rooms, it can be booked on an exclusive-use basis, making this a wonderful Garden Route retreat for families, couples or friends travelling together.

Tamodi comprises 7 luxury suites, each designed around a grand main house with a swimming pool.  Each suite has an en-suite bathroom with a separate bath & shower as well as an outdoor deck with seating, offering unspoilt views over the valley below the lodge.
Some suites also offer outdoor showers & private plunge pools – the ideal place to unwind after a day out exploring the Garden Route.
The main area includes 2 spacious lounges, a bar, a cosy library & a sparkling swimming pool.

title: THE PLETTENBERG
description:
Perched high on a rocky headland, overlooking the golden Formosa Beach in Plettenberg Bay, the sophisticated & intimate beach hotel promises captivating & uninterrupted views of the ocean below.
The Plettenberg is perfectly situated to some of the area’s best beaches, including the ever-popular Central Beach as well as blue flag Robberg Beach.  Excellent whale watching can be experienced here between August to December each year.
Apart from their award-winning seafood restaurant & stylish bar as well as an on-site wellness spa & 2 heated infinity pools, The Plettenberg also caters for younger guests.  Children can enjoy a range of exciting activities like bodyboarding, beach tennis, popcorn & movies or interactive cooking lessons with a friendly chef.  Babysitting is also available.

The Plettenberg offers a range of rooms, suites & villas.  
All rooms have air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.  The suites offer beautiful ocean views & the villas offer either 2 or 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, along with an open-plan living area, deck & private swimming pool.
Top-notch facilities at The Plettenberg include 2 heated infinity pools with views over the bay & its resident dolphins, a wellness spa offering a range of relaxing treatments as well as a restaurant, bar, library & fitness centre.

title: THE REX HOTEL
description:
Situated in Knysna’s trendy Grey Street – a thoroughfare lined with cafes, restaurants & boutiques, you will find The Rex Hotel.
Just around the corner, the Knysna Waterfront invites guests to browse, shop or dine to their hearts’ content & return to their quiet slice of paradise tucked away in a remote corner of this seaside town.
Their on-site restaurant serves mouth-watering breakfast options & delectable Mediterranean cuisine – the perfect dining option after a day of Garden Route exploration.

There are 56 rooms at The Rex Hotel, all reflecting an urban chic ambience, mixing contemporary & classic décor with cool colours & rich fabrics.
Each room features air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
On-site facilities include a sparkling swimming pool where lazy afternoons are often spent, as well as a restaurant that serves delicious cuisine.

title: THE TURNBINE BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
Located on Thesen Island in Knysna Lagoon, The Turbine Boutique Hotel is unique in every way.  This converted power station is now an upscale boutique hotel with a unique look & feel.  
All the original machinery has been integrated into the design of the hotel to remind guests of its glorious past.
With an exceptional on-site restaurant that serves fresh Knysna oysters, as well as a lovely viewing deck & Tapas Bar, The Turbine Boutique Hotel does not disappoint when it comes to dining.  
In fact, guests can also enjoy sundowner cruises on the hotel’s private pontoon boat while watching the sun sets over the quiet lagoon.

The Turbine Boutique Hotel features 17 standard rooms, 6 luxury rooms, 2 self-catering suites & a honeymoon suite.
The standard rooms include air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.  Each luxury room includes a relaxing lounge area while the honeymoon suite boasts a lounge & entertainment area as well as beautiful views over the Knysna Lagoon’s waterways.  The self-catering suites are similar to the honeymoon suite, but also include an open-plan kitchen.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, library, gym, pool & wellness spa.

title: THE WINDERMERE
description:
Set in the upscale suburb of Humewood, close to the prestigious Humewood Golf Club & Port Elizabeth Airport, you will find The Windermere – a contemporary boutique hotel with direct access to King’s Beach.
The boutique hotel is within walking distance to the endless blue flag beaches & independent eateries, & The Boardwalk can also be found nearby.
Since there are only a small number of suites at The Windermere, personalized service & warm South African hospitality awaits.

There are 8 elegant suites, as well as 1 large suite with a second bedroom, which is ideal for families.  Each suite has air-conditioning, underfloor heating & an en-suite bathroom.
The main area is home to a private lounge, library, bar & outdoor patio with a swimming pool.  
Nearby, you will also find a gym, spa & golf course.

title: TSALA TREETOP LODGE
description:
Tsala Treetop Lodge, as the name suggests, is located within a magnificent forest along South Africa’s ever-popular Garden Route.  
The Tsitsikamma Forest boasts beautiful nature walks & is a short drive away from Plettenberg Bay, where you can enjoy white, sandy beaches & outstanding restaurants.
Tsala is our childhood dream come true.  Set in a lush forest, exclusive treetop suites with private plunge pools offer jaw-dropping views over the beautiful surroundings.   
This is a honeymooner’s paradise.  Here at Tsala, couples will experience exceptional service, beautiful tree-house suites, utter privacy & relaxing in-room spa treatments.

Tsala Treetop Lodge has 10 luxury timber suites that are connected to the main area via elevated wooden walkways.
Each tree suite is equipped with a private viewing deck, plunge pool & lavish bathroom.  During winter, relax by the cosy fireplace while enjoying a glass of wine & in summer, sit on the deck & marvel at the fairytale views from the comfort of your tree suite.
Tsala guests can enjoy 24-hour room service, air-conditioning, double showers & private balconies.  
The main lodge features a comfortable lounge, dining room, restaurant, bar, wine cellar & swimming pool.  There is also a wellness spa set among beautiful gardens.

title: ATHOLPLACE HOUSE &amp; VILLA
description:
AtholPlace House & Villa is set in Johannesburg’s upscale neighbourhood of Sandton & offers 2 luxury exclusive-use options that are conveniently close to Nelson Mandela Square & OR Tambo International Airport.
Guests can choose between the 9-bedroom house or the 4-bedroom villa.  Both properties are sophisticated in design & provide a luxurious stay for the discerning traveller in search of privacy & seclusion.
A member of Relais & Chateaux, AtholPlace House & Villa come with a private chef, butler, host & housekeeping staff – ensuring the highest quality of service.  
Both properties feature a swimming pool, a private gym & beautiful, manicured gardens where al fresco dinners are served.  
Nearby, you will find many upscale malls & restaurants should guests choose to explore Johannesburg city & surrounds.

AtholPlace House is the bigger of the 2 properties & can sleep up to 18 guests in 9 elegant bedrooms.  The house also includes a lounge, a bar & library with a romantic fireplace, a temperature-controlled swimming pool, a gym & a lush garden to relax in.  
AtholPlace Villa can sleep 8 guests in 4 bedrooms in a home-away-from-home setting.  All bedrooms have access to a large, shared balcony offering a view of the private garden & pool.  Downstairs you will find a large living room with a separate television area, as well as a beautifully furnished dining room & a fully equipped kitchen & small study.  The large garden features a temperature-controlled pool, a fire pit boma & shady trees, perfect for alfresco lunches.  
Both properties can be booked on a bed & breakfast, fully inclusive or all-inclusive basis.  The all-inclusive basis also includes the AtholPlace guide & vehicle for touring Johannesburg City.

title: D’OREALE GRANDE
description:
Situated conveniently close to OR Tambo International Airport, The D’Oreale Grande is a 5-star Las Vegas-style casino resort that offers round-the-clock entertainment right on your doorstep.
Guests staying at this world-class hotel will have direct access to the Emperor’s Palace with its many restaurants, theatre shows, boutique shops & clubs.
Hotel guests will also be able to make use of their complimentary shuttle service to & from the airport – a welcome treat after a long-haul flight.
For those wishing to escape the hustle & bustle of the Emperor’s Palace, the wellness spa is the perfect place to get rejuvenated before your next flight.

The Roman-inspired interior at D’Oreale Grande offers guests a truly glamorous stay. 
Guests can choose between classic rooms, deluxe rooms, superior rooms & club floor superior rooms.  All 196 air-conditioned rooms are beautifully decorated & have en-suite bathrooms.
The hotel features a restaurant that serves delicious cuisine as well as a cocktail bar & lounge where pre-dinner drinks are enjoyed.  Guests can cool off in the hotel’s swimming pool or work up a sweat in the 24-hour gym.  Their wellness day spa offers a range of relaxing treatments – the perfect remedy for jet lag.

title: FAIRLAWNS BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
With an ideal setting in Johannesburg’s affluent neighbourhood of Sandton, Fairlawns Boutique Hotel is an opulent 5-star retreat that offers discerning guests a tranquil oasis amongst the glittering lights of the city.
Set in a beautiful, manicured estate, the award-winning Fairlawns Boutique Hotel is ideally located to explore South Africa’s ‘City of Gold’ as Johannesburg is known.  Nearby, you will find top-class shopping, museums, galleries & trendy eateries.  
Their on-site Balinese spa offers a range of innovative treatments – the perfect place to relax after a long-haul flight.  Service is of utmost importance at Fairlawns, so guests can expect to receive the highest level of hospitality.

Accommodation at Fairlawns is lavish & comprises 20 grand chateau suites, 12 courtyard suites, 6 villa suites, a two-bedroom treehouse studio, a two-bedroom Maison Spa Suite & a three-bedroom villa.
The grand chateau suites are individually decorated & feature comfortable sofas & sandstone fireplaces.  Graced by a formal garden, the courtyard suites have high ceilings, fireplaces & spacious bathrooms with separate baths & showers.
Some of the villa suites have balconies, while others open onto an oak-shaded terrace.  All villa suites have underfloor heating in the bathrooms & fireplaces.  The 2-bedroom treehouse studio has been designed with families in mind.  It has a state-of-the-art kitchen as well as a lounge & dining room.
The 2-bedroom Maison Spa Suite consists of a study, kitchenette, dining room & lounge, as well as a balcony overlooking the gardens & pool.  The private 3-bedroom villa boasts Persian carpets, a heated pool & an alfresco lounge & a dining area.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, library, gym, swimming pool & spa.

title: FOUR SEASONS HOTEL THE WESTCLIFF
description:
Set in one of Johannesburg’s most exclusive & affluent residential enclaves, the Four Seasons Hotel The Westcliff boasts an elevated position that offers breathtaking views of Johannesburg’s tree canopy & upscale neighbourhoods below.
A stone’s throw away, you will find the upscale shopping district of Sandton & the Johannesburg Zoo, while OR Tambo International Airport is only a short drive away.
This refined hotel is renowned for its fine dining & full butler service, so guests can expect only the best in service & cuisine.  
Boasting a wellness spa, a fitness centre, 5 on-site restaurants & 2 heated swimming pools, Four Seasons guests will have ample choice in facilities & activities.

Surrounded by 2 beautiful gardens & lush emerald lawns, the hotel provides a tranquil oasis in this vibrant ‘City of Gold.’
Four Seasons Hotel The Westcliff offers 117 rooms & suites inspired by contemporary Africa, all featuring private terraces.  There are also family suites available for parents travelling with children.
The hotel offers floodlit tennis courts & a gym with a team of personal trainers as well as a 9-room spa & 2 heated swimming pools.  The spa offers a range of relaxing treatments – the perfect place to recover from jet lag.  Delicious cuisine is served at their 5 on-site restaurants, so guests will have a variety of dining options.

title: INTERCONTINENTAL HOTEL
description:
Located just a few steps outside OR Tambo’s International Arrivals Hall, the Intercontinental Hotel offers guests the perfect blend between luxury & comfort.
Standing proud, just shy of 70 meters from the airport building, the Intercontinental Hotel is – without a doubt – Johannesburg’s best option for an overnight stay.  Regardless of your arrival time, there is no need to wait for a taxi or sit in traffic – after only a few steps, you will reach your destination.
The hotel boasts a wellness spa, fitness centre & a heated swimming pool for those wishing to get rejuvenated after a long-haul flight.
Dining is important at the Intercontinental Hotel.  Delicious breakfasts are served along with African-fushion cuisine at their on-site restaurant.  In-room dining is also available.

The hotel is home to 108 deluxe rooms, 27 executive rooms, 2 presidential suites & 1 disabled room.
The well-appointed deluxe rooms are tastefully decorated with subtle influences of Africa.  These rooms have spacious showers, blackout curtains & soundproofing to ensure a night of relaxation.  
Executive rooms occupy corners of the hotel providing impressive views & ample natural light.  En-suite bathrooms have luxurious showers with massage showerheads to ensure the utmost comfort.  
Families who request inter-leading rooms can book an executive room & deluxe room next door as one unit.  Due to minimal inter-leading rooms, specifying this need is important.  The 2 presidential suites are located on the 7th floor & boast beautiful views.  
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, cocktail bar, gym, spa & swimming pool.

title: MICHELANGELO TOWERS
description:
The sophisticated Michelangelo Towers is situated in trendy Sandton – one of Johannesburg most affluent areas.
Offering panoramic views of the Sandton skyline & the distant Magaliesburg Mountains, the hotel is the perfect base from which to explore the vibrant ‘City of Gold.’
Within a 2-minute walk, you will find the popular Nelson Mandela Square – a hive of world-class shopping & fine restaurants – as well as other major city attractions.
The hotel boasts a fitness centre for those wishing to stay active on holiday & the indoor & outdoor swimming pools are ideal spots to relax after a day of city exploration & shopping.

Michelangelo Towers features a range of different suites, each beautifully designed with luxury & comfort in mind.
There are one-bedroom suites, two-bedroom suites, a 3-bedroom presidential suite as well as one-bedroom & two-bedroom apartments.
Each suite features an open-plan living & dining area & each apartment has a dining & sitting area as well as a kitchen.  Hotel facilities include a restaurant, cocktail bar, gym, spa & 2 swimming pools.

title: MOUNT GRACE HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Perched high in the Magaliesberg Mountains lies Mount Grace House & Spa, a luxurious retreat set in a private country estate.
Surrounded by beautiful, English gardens, the property has a rich & well-defined sense of tradition & is situated only an hour’s drive from Johannesburg.
On-site, you will find an award-winning spa located on a hilltop, a modern gym & 4 on-site restaurants serving a variety of options from full English breakfasts & light lunches to country-style buffets & gourmet fine dining.

Surrounded by bushveld, this leading Magaliesberg hotel offers a choice of 121 stylish & spacious suites that are discreetly positioned in gorgeous, lush gardens.
Rooms have in-room climate control & elegant bathrooms with large showers & huge indulgent baths.  There are also well-appointed 2-bedroom units, an ideal choice for families with young children.  The hotel also boasts romantic villas with panoramic views & private plunge pools.
Hotel facilities include an 18-room spa offering a full range of treatments as well as a bush bath, located away from the main building.  The spa also features a jacuzzi, waterfall & flotation pool that are set in the hydrotherapy spa garden.
There is also a library, a swimming pool, a tennis court & a modern gym where guests can stay active as well as 4 restaurants serving a variety of delicious cuisine.

title: RADISSON BLU HOTEL SANDTON
description:
The Radisson Blu Hotel Sandton boasts a spectacular location in Johannesburg’s trendiest area & offers an ideal base from which to explore the vibrant ‘City of Gold.
The stylish hotel boasts captivating views of the bustling city as well as ultra-modern facilities, including a large swimming pool with stunning views, a wellness spa offering a range of relaxing treatments & a fitness centre where guests can get their heart rate going before the start of their day.
Nearby, you will find a wide variety of restaurants to choose from, along with a hive of boutique shops & some of Johannesburg main attractions.

The Radisson Blu Hotel Sandton features 302 rooms with air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.
There are standard rooms with city views, superior rooms with pool views & executive rooms with park views & private lounge access.
Guests can soak up the magnificent views on the sun deck which wraps around the large swimming pool on the 8th floor of the hotel.  The wellness spa offers a range of holistic body & beauty treatments & the state-of-the-art gym is the perfect place for active guests to work up a sweat.
There is also an elegant wine & bar lounge where pre-dinner drinks or delicious cocktails can be enjoyed & on the 9th floor, you will find an outdoor swimming pool & deck offering captivating views.

title: ROVOS RAIL
description:
Rovos Rail offers a luxury train holiday like no other.  
Apart from owning & operating the most luxurious trains in the world, Rovos Rail offers guests a variety of train journeys - each ranging from 2 nights to 2 weeks.
Short train trips include travelling from Cape Town to Pretoria or north to the majestic Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe.  The longest & most famous route is an epic rail journey that starts in Cape Town & passes through some of Africa’s most magnificent scenery to Dar es Salaam.
Elegant train carriages, spacious suites & fine dining is what the Rovos Rail journeys are all about.  For many guests, a real highlight of their Rovos experience is the 4-course suave dinners – a jacket-&-tie affair that never disappoints.
Everything is included in a Rovos Rail journey – all meals, drinks, snacks, high teas & even off-train activities & excursions, so guests can sit back & relax in style.
Rohan Vos started Rovos Rail in 1989 (hence the name) & is still very much involved in the company, endeavouring to personally welcome every guest arriving & departing from Rovos’ private train station in Pretoria.

Rovos Rail boasts 3 suite types that are the perfect balance between vintage carriages & modern luxury.  Pullman suites are 7 sq meters, Deluxe suites are 10 sq meters & Royal Suites are 16 sq meters.
All suites have fittings & furnishings of the highest standard & include en-suite bathrooms with a shower, toilet, basin & bath (Royal suites only).
The observation car seats 32 passengers & comprises an open-air balcony, big pictures windows, a bar, sofas & booths.

title: THE MASLOW
description:
Located in Sandton, Johannesburg’s most affluent neighbourhood, The Maslow offers beautiful views over the vibrant city as well a wide range of modern facilities.
The hotel features a top-notch spa where relaxing treatments can be enjoyed & a state-of-the-art gym where active guests can work up a sweat before they start their day.
Guests can enjoy a complimentary shuttle service to Sandton city for an afternoon of high-end shopping or dine at one of the city’s world-class restaurants.  
Meals at the hotel are fantastic.  A la carte breakfasts are served each morning while aromatic barista-made coffee can be enjoyed at their urban bistro.  Lunch at the lounge bar is a relaxed affair while evenings are all about 3-course dinners paired with excellent wines.

The Maslow is home to 281 rooms & suites, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.  
Some rooms have balconies, some have a separate bath & shower while others have only a shower.  The suites are slightly larger & features lounge & dining spaces.     
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a state-of-the-art gym, a wellness spa & a swimming pool.

title: THE MICHELANGELO HOTEL
description:
The luxurious Michelangelo Hotel is set in Nelson Mandel Square at the heart of Sandton, Johannesburg’s most affluent neighbourhood.   
Offering direct access to world-class shopping & restaurants, the hotel is the perfect base from which to explore the vibrant ‘City of Gold.’
Families will feel comfortable at The Michelangelo Hotel, since suites are extremely spacious & the hotel is situated near the Gautrain’s airport express service.
Guests who are looking for a relaxing stay will enjoy the heated indoor pool as well as the steam bath, wellness spa & gym.

The Michelangelo Hotel features a range of different rooms & suites, each beautifully designed with luxury & comfort in mind.
There are 219 deluxe & superior rooms, 23 executive & premier suites & 2 presidential suites.  
The superior rooms & deluxe rooms consist of a bedroom & lounge area.  The superior rooms’ bedroom & lounge areas are on one level & can fit an extra bed or cot while the deluxe room is a split-level unit.
Executive rooms are open-plan in design & the premier suites have doors between the bedroom & lounge areas, giving them a more private feel.
The presidential suites overlook Nelson Mandela Square, have inter-leading doors to a second bedroom & feature a dining room, lounge & kitchenette with a butler.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a heated indoor pool, a wellness spa, a gym & a library.

title: THE PEECH HOTEL
description:
The Peech Hotel offers a boutique-style experience in the heart of Melrose, one of Johannesburg’s most leafy & affluent areas.  
With Sandton around the corner, guests will have quick access to the city’s glamorous shopping, high-end restaurants & museums, making this an ideal base from which to explore the vibrant city of Johannesburg.
Ideal for an overnight stay, The Peech offers spacious suites with heavenly rain-showers, a swimming pool surrounded by manicured gardens & even a rotating art & photography exhibition for art-lovers.
Their charming champagne bar offers delicious pre-dinner cocktails & delectable cuisine is served at their sophisticated bistro.

The Peech Hotel offers 5 classic rooms, 5 luxury rooms, 2 peech suites & a 2-bedroom presidential villa.
The classic rooms boast en-suite bathrooms with both shower & bath as well as private patios offering views over the garden & pool.  Each luxury room has glass doors that open onto a large, private terrace or patio as well as a well-appointed bathroom with a large walk-in rain shower.
The peech suites are the most spacious & feature extra-large bathrooms, open-plan living spaces, patios or private garden terraces with views over the heated pool or landscaped garden as well as hanging pod chairs for further relaxation.
The two-bedroom peech villa offers 2 en-suite bathrooms, a central lounge area & an outdoor patio with a water feature.  The master bedroom boasts a free-standing bath & the second bedroom has a large walk-in shower.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a library, a swimming pool & a gym.

title: THE RESIDENCE JOHANNESBURG
description:
Houghton is Johannesburg’s most affluent neighbourhood & it is here where The Residence has made a name for itself as one of the best boutique hotels in the city.
Sophisticated & elegant in every way, discerning guests will enjoy The Residence’ impeccable service, beautifully landscaped gardens & culinary delights, including the finest wine from their well-stocked wine cellar.
Their stylish rooftop bar offers breathtaking sunsets & on-site you will find a private gym, spa, tennis courts & swimming pools where guests can relax & get rejuvenated.  
Avid golfers can enjoy a round of golf at the nearby Houghton Golf Course & a mere 10-minutes away, guests can experience world-class shopping & fine dining in trendy Sandton.

Accommodation at The Residence includes a range of elegant rooms & suites, each with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The luxury rooms & luxury suites have underfloor heating as well as additional outdoor showers & baths.  Some also have outdoor jacuzzis.  
The Madiba luxury suite & penthouse luxury suite have separate lounge & dining areas as well as a rooftop deck area with an outdoor shower & jacuzzi.
The pool villa is situated on the ground floor, overlooking the gardens & features a heated plunge pool & fireplace.  Each one-bedroom suite offers a separate lounge, a veranda overlooking the garden & pool & a jacuzzi with pool loungers.  
There is also a 5-bedroom villa that can be booked out on an exclusive-use basis.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a library, a swimming pool, a wellness spa & a gym.

title: THE SAXON HOTEL
description:
The award-winning Saxon Hotel in Johannesburg has famously hosted former president & Nobel Laureate Nelson Mandela, so it is not surprising that this sophisticated establishment offers only the best in South African hospitality.
In addition to The Saxon’s impeccable service, the hotel is also a member of Chaine des Rotisseurs – an International Association of Gastronomy & the world’s oldest & most prestigious food & wine society who strive to guarantee guests world-class international dining.
Guests can expect only the highest level of luxury.  From private villas with plunge pools & an international art collection to butler services & pillow menus – The Saxon has it all.
Their wellness studio offers a wide range of relaxing treatments & guests can take a stroll in the lush & beautiful gardens.

The Saxon features a range of beautiful suites.  These include 20 luxury suites, 21 villa luxury suites, 3 presidential suites, 8 villa presidential suites, a Nelson Mandela platinum suite & 3 Saxon luxury villas.
The luxury suites have open-plan lounge & dining areas.  In addition, the villa luxury suites have private decks leading out into the lush gardens.  The presidential suites also have a kitchen & balcony with gorgeous views of the Johannesburg skyline while the villa presidential suites have access to a terrace with a private plunge pool.
The Nelson Mandela Suite also has a lounge, dining area & kitchen – but in addition, also features a second en-suite bedroom & steam room as well as views over the garden & pool terrace.  This suite comes with a dedicated butler.  The Saxon luxury villas offer the best in luxury, comprising a lounge & dining space, a breakfast area & bar with a dedicated butler & chef as well as a terrace with a private plunge pool.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a library, a swimming pool, a wellness spa & a gym.

title: KIGALI MARRIOTT
description:
Kigali Marriott Hotel is located within downtown Kigali, close to the financial district & Kigali City Hall.  The hotel is the ideal base from which to explore the city, or overnight before or after a gorilla- & chimp-trekking safari.  
With an onsite spa, restaurant, cocktail bar & outdoor pool, guests will be able to enjoy all these amenities without ever having to leave the hotel.

The Kigali Marriott has 254 rooms spread across 8 floors.  While these vary in terms of size & facilities, they all share floor to ceiling windows with views over Kigali.  Room amenities include air-conditioning, a well-appointed en-suite marble bathroom with bathtub & shower.
The 25 suites are more spacious than the standard rooms.  The junior suites come with an adjoining lounge, whereas the executive & presidential suites are vast, featuring a private dining area & a small kitchenette.  The presidential suite also has a beautiful rooftop terrace.
Cucina Restaurant offers tasty, innovative Italian fare while the Lobby Bar is ideal for cocktails & city vistas.  The Saray Spa is the largest in the city & offers a range of relaxing treatments.

title: KIGALI SERENA HOTEL?
description:
Kigali Serena Hotel is located along one of Kigali’s most charming boulevards & has become a popular attraction in the city.
This luxuriously styled hotel combines traditional Rwandese art & culture with modern amenities.  The hotel is the ideal base from which to explore the city, or overnight before or after a gorilla- & chimp-trekking safari.  
With an onsite spa, restaurant, cocktail bar & outdoor pool, guests will be able to enjoy all these amenities without ever having to leave the hotel.

The Kigali Serena boasts 148 rooms in total.  They are divided into standard rooms, superior rooms, deluxe rooms, prime rooms, executive suites, studio suites & a presidential suite.  All of these includes en-suite bathrooms, 24-hour room service & air conditioning.
Sokoni Café & Bar serves wonderful meals & cocktails, while the health spa offers a range of relaxing treatments.  Guests can also lounge beside the pool while reading a book.

title: THE RETREAT BY HEAVEN
description:
The Retreat by Heaven is arguably Kigali’s best premier boutique hotel.  Located in the heart of the capital, The Retreat provides a tranquil sanctuary after a long-haul flight or an exhilarating gorilla trek.
The hotel is a forerunner when it comes to lightening its environmental impact & is therefore powered by sunlight.  
Their casual onsite restaurant – aptly named, Heaven – serves up fresh local produce turned into international dishes while Fushion serves fine dining cuisine with the indigenous garden & pool as the backdrop.

The Retreat by Heaven offers 3 deluxe rooms, 8 superior suites, 3 master suites & 8 luxury pool villas.  All rooms include en-suite bathrooms.  
The deluxe rooms have furnished patios while the superior suites have furnished front balconies, private back decks as well as separate sitting areas.
The master suites are slightly larger than the superior suites & overlook the pool area.
The luxury pool villas boast private saltwater heated plunge pools as well as bedrooms with full living areas & 120 square meters of indoor & outdoor private living space.
The main area comprises a spa, gym, 2 restaurants, bar & saltwater swimming pool.

title: LATITUDE 13 DEGREES
description:
Latitude 13 Degrees is a stylish & contemporary boutique hotel located in Lilongwe’s quiet & leafy district.  Standing out above the rest, the hotel raises the bar for urban accommodation in Malawi’s capital city.
Latitude 13 Degrees is only a 10-minute drive from the CBD & a 30-minute drive from Kamuzu Airport, offering guests a sophisticated level of comfort before or after a journey through Malawi.

There are 9 spacious suites set in a tropical garden, each complete with a lounge & private terrace.  The en-suite bathrooms boast large sunken baths & walk-in rain showers. 
The central area features a restaurant, swimming pool, bar, gym & wellness spa where relaxing treatments can be enjoyed.

title: DAVID LIVINGSTONE LODGE
description:
David Livingstone Lodge & Spa is centrally located only 5km from the town of Livingstone in Zambia & offers a unique location with breathtaking views.
As the name suggests, the majestic waterfall was discovered by the famous explorer, Dr David Livingstone in 1855 & is a must-see for guests visiting Zambia.

David Livingstone Lodge consists of 72 standard rooms (of which 3 rooms are inter-leading) & 5 suites. 
Most of the rooms offer breathtaking views over the mighty Zambezi River from the private balconies where leisurely sundowners can be enjoyed.
All rooms are spacious & beautifully decorated.  
The main deck area has a sparkling swimming pool & is built right on the river - offering a true gastronomic experience.  This is an ideal place to relax, put up your feet & enjoy some of Africa’s most beautiful sunsets.

title: ROYAL CHUNDU
description:
Zambia’s family-owned & run Royal Chundu is set on a private stretch of riverbank on the the Zambezi River, just upstream of the iconic Victoria Falls.
Royal Chundu consists of 2 lodges – River Lodge & Island Lodge, & as the name suggests, both properties are fit for royalty.  Ideal for honeymooners, couples or families, Royal Chundu is all about exceeding expectations.
The lodge is only a 40-minute drive from the Falls, making it the ideal base to explore this world wonder.

River Lodge at Royal Chundu is the main hub & the larger of the 2 lodges.  There are 10 beautifully appointed, spacious riverfront suites, each with en-suite bathroom, air-conditioning & a generous deck with spectacular views.
The entire lodge looks out onto the mighty Zambezi River on the opposite side of the river.
Island Lodge at Royal Chundu is the more private & exclusive of the 2 lodges.  With a stunning location on Katambura Private Island, the lodge is surrounded by gentle river channels & lush trees.  There are 4 elegant, air-conditioned villas at Island Lodge, each comprising an en-suite bathroom with large open-air bath & a spectacular deck with views.

title: SANCTUARY SUSSI &amp; CHUMA
description:
Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma is a tree-fort safari lodge set on a dramatic bend of the Zambezi River within the game-packed Mosi-Oa-Tunya Park, upstream from the legendary Victoria Falls.
Named after Dr David Livingstone’s knowledgeable & local guides, Sussi & Chuma is a laid-back, family-friendly lodge where guests can enjoy the park’s peace & tranquility, while still being close enough to the action-packed Victoria Falls with all its fun-filled activities.

Surrounded by large ebony & jackalberry trees, Sussi & Chuma comprises 12 elegant tree-house suites connected by wooden walkways.  From here awe-inspiring views over the hippo-filled river can be observed.
Each treehouse includes air-conditioning, en-suite facilities with bathtub & private viewing deck.
The central area at Sussi & Chuma features a lounge, dining room, spa, bar & swimming pool where lazy afternoons can be enjoyed.

title: SINDABEZI ISLAND LODGE
description:
Sindabezi Island Lodge is an exclusive camp offering luxurious island accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls on the Zambian side.
A romantic hideaway with only 5 chalets & extraordinary river views, Sindabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & offers a range of fantastic fully inclusive activities.  
This accredited eco-lodge is miles away from any tourist bustle, offering a tranquil & remote safari haven.

The 5 open-sided thatched chalets allow guests to soak up the sights & sounds of a pristine African bush setting.  
Each chalet features a distinctive ‘toilet with a view’ set along a private wooden walkway as well as solar heated shower.
Sindabezi Island can also be booked exclusively.  Friends or families can now make their dreams come true by staying on their own remote island.

title: TAITA FALCON LODGE
description:
Taita Falcon Lodge is set above the mighty Zambezi River, overlooking its winding waters & the dramatic cliffs of the Batoka Gorge.  
This Zambian wilderness retreat is all about the views!  With its vast viewing platform, it is the perfect place to sit & take in Zambia’s scenic vistas. 
This area boasts a variety of trails where guests can explore the gorge & the indigenous forests.

Taita Falcon Lodge has 7 stylish en-suite chalets, each featuring its own secluded garden, outdoor shower & indoor lounge.
All the chalets have been designed using local materials such as stones form the gorge & reeds from the fiver.  
The main area includes a bar, pool & boma area.

title: THE ROYAL LIVINGSTONE
description:
The Royal Livingstone, like the name suggests, is a 5-star hotel situated on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia, within walking distance to The Falls.
This charming hotel offers the discerning traveler an elegant & refined colonial ambience with world class service & countless activities.
The Royal Livingstone is the closest hotel to The Falls on the Zambian side & therefore guests can see the waterfall’s spray from the hotel veranda.  The edge of The Falls can be seen from the sun deck & there is direct access to the world wonder from the hotel grounds.

Luxurious accommodation at The Royal Livingstone consists of 173 rooms set in colonial-style villas under the shade of acacia trees on the banks of the Zambezi River, offering gorgeous views of the river & surrounding forest.
These en-suite rooms are divided between premier rooms, deluxe rooms, deluxe corner rooms & suites.  
The suites also include separate lounge areas.  The Presidential Suite is ideal for friends or family traveling together as it boasts 2 luxurious bedrooms, a lounge & private terrace.
The gracious main area features an elegant dining room, lounge, veranda overlooking the lawns, hotel bar, sundeck as well as a swimming pool looking out over the mighty Zambezi River.

title: THORNTREE RIVER LODGE
description:
Thorntree River Lodge, one of Zambia’s most contemporary lodges boasts a spectacular setting on the legendary Zambezi River, just upstream from Zambia’s biggest drawcard:  the mighty Victoria Falls.
Thorntree has an eco-concious design that incorporates nature & 21-century living.  
With a superb location, guests have easy access to the Falls & all the fun-filled activities it has to offer, while allowing peace & tranquility in a pristine riverfront setting.

Small & intimate, with only 8 suites & 2 family suites, Thorntree River Lodge gives guests a boutique experience on the river’s edge.
Each suite has an indoor & outdoor en-suite bathroom & a private plunge pool with spectacular river views.
The 2 family units have inter-leading walkways between the 2 bedrooms, which are both en-suite.  Each unit has its own indoor & outdoor bathroom as well as luxurious plunge pool. 
Thorntree’s central area comprises a temperature-controlled wine cellar, gym, spa, dining room, lounge & swimming pool.

title: TOKA LEYA
description:
Toka Leya is a secluded luxury tented camp located 12km upstream from Victoria Falls & enjoys a beautiful location on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia.
Set within the Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park, this unique tented camp is the ideal place to stay for those wishing to enjoy magnificent scenery, river views & plenty of activities – while being close enough to experience the majestic Victoria Falls.

Toka Leya consists of 9 safari-style tents as well as 3 family tents, all inter-connected by a web of wooden walkways.  
Each tent is beautifully decorated in neutral, earthy tones & features a sleeping area with lounge leading out via large glass doors onto a wrap-around balcony.  The family tents can comfortably sleep 4 people. 
All tents have en-suite bathrooms with indoor & outdoor showers.  
The inviting main viewing deck is shaded by a canopy of jackalberry & waterberry trees, designed to make the most of the amazing river & island views.  This main area comprises a lounge, dining area, bar, spa, gym, library & pool.

title: TONGABEZI LODGE
description:
Tongabezi Lodge in Zambia is set on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River & offers secluded & luxurious accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls.
A romantic hideaway with extraordinary river views, Tongabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & is the ideal destination for the discerning traveler looking for romance, tranquility & beautiful scenery.  
The lodge is far from the hustle & bustle, but close enough to the thundering Victoria Falls in Livingstone with its action-packed activities.

Luxurious accommodation consists of 5 river cottages & 6 houses with names like The Garden House, The Nut House, the Dog House, the Tree House, the Bird House & the Honeymoon House.
Each river cottage overlooks the Zambezi River through large windows & features a spacious en-suite bathroom & generous indoor area – ideal for relaxation or private dining.
The 2-bedroom Garden House is situated behind a private walled garden & set back from the river, featuring a private dining area, large lounge, 2 double en-suite bathrooms & plunge pool.  
The raised glass-tiled Nut House boasts folding doors opening onto a private garden & plunge pool.  The open-fronted Dog House enjoys beautiful river views as well as a spacious deck for private dining.  
The multi-level Tree House features an open-air bedroom, large sunken bath & gorgeous river views.  The Bird House is also open-air, spacious & has a private terrace for outdoor dining.  
The Honeymoon House is exceptionally private, overlooking the river & providing the ideal candlelit dinner location.

title: EKA HOTEL
description:
Ideally located on Mombasa Avenue, Eka Hotel provides an ideal base from which to explore the vibrant city of Nairobi & has easy access to Jomo Kenyatta & Wilson Airports.
Eka Hotel offers contemporary accommodation, two on-site restaurants, a swimming pool & fitness centre as well as babysitting services, laundry & shuttle transfers.

Accommodation comprises superior rooms, junior suites & executive suites, all featuring open-plan en-suite bathrooms.
The junior suites also have sitting areas & executive rooms have sitting & working areas.
Communal areas include 2 restaurants, a bar, gym, pool & wellness spa where relaxing treatments can be enjoyed.

title: HEMINGWAYS NAIROBI
description:
Hemingways Nairobi is set within the tranquil & upscale neighbourhood of Karen & offers luxurious suites & exceptional service.
Overlooking the Ngong Hills in Nairobi, this boutique hotel is the ideal stop-over for pre or post-safari stays.  With nearby attractions like the Nairobi National Park or top restaurants like The Talisman, guests will be able to experience Kenya’s capital in style.
Personal butlers & award-winning cuisine from the resident Michelin-starred chef are standard at Hemingways Nairobi.

There are 45 high-ceilinged suites, 2 of which are penthouse style presidential suites & 43 junior suites that are divided between deluxe suites, executive suites & the large one-bedroom Karen Blixen Suite.  All rooms have en-suite bathrooms.
The deluxe suites are located on the ground floor & feature a sitting area & private terrace.  
Similar in style but located on the upper floor, you will find the executive suites.
Spacious & beautiful in design, the Karen Blixen suite includes an elegant living & dining area, guest WC & kitchen with butler access.  The private terrace offers exquisite views of the surroundings.
Each of the 2 presidential suites includes a living room, study, dining room, guest WC & private kitchen with butler access.  The large terrace offers breathtaking views over the rolling lawns & Ngong Hills.
Communal relaxation areas include a brasserie, a fine dining restaurant, an open wine cellar & plush bar as well as a fitness centre & wellness spa.

title: NAIROBI TENTED CAMP
description:
Nairobi Tented Camp enjoys an ideal setting within the Nairobi National Park – an authentic big game reserve on the outskirts of the city.  
Tucked away in a riverine forest, this charming, tented camp is a great introduction to a Kenya safari.  
Nairobi Tented Camp is an ideal choice for guests who need to stop over in Nairobi before or after a Kenya safari, but still prefer to get away from the hustle & bustle of city life.
The park is home to over 100 mammal species - including rhino (a rare sighting in the Mara) as well as buffalo, giraffe, lion, leopard, baboon, zebra, wildebeest & cheetah.  Bird enthusiasts can spot over 400 migratory & endemic birds here.

The camp consists of 9 luxury tents, all equipped with en-suite facilities.  Each en-suite bathroom features a hot bucket shower, basin & toilet.
Each spacious tent has an exclusive, yet friendly feel.  Tastefully furnished with local material, the tents have private verandas offering beautiful views over the bush.
The central mess tent houses the bar, dining & lounge facilities.

title: OLOLO SAFARI LODGE
description:
Nairobi National Park is the only park in the world that borders a capital city & on its border lies Ololo Safari Lodge, a classic safari haven set in 20 acres of lush gardens.
Its ideal setting within 45 minutes from Jomo Kenyatta International Airport & its convenient access through the park makes this an ideal choice for travellers who would like to start their safari on the first day they arrive in Kenya.
Uninterrupted views can be enjoyed from the comfort of the lodge’s spacious verandas & the surrounding gardens provide shelter for many of the 500 bird species of the national park.
Four of the Big 5 members can frequently be spotted from Ololo’s main terrace. (there are no elephants here)

There are a variety of room types at Ololo, including 7 stable rooms, 3 tented cottages, 2 suites & 1 three-bedroom stable cottage that is ideal for families.
The stable rooms were once original stone-built horse stables, now all equipped with new bathrooms & traditional stable doors.
Nestled on the edge of the park are the tented cottages with Makuti roofs & partial canvas, offering guests a safari-style experience.  
The suites have traditional living areas with open fireplaces & French doors opening to private terraces with views of the garden & park.
Perfect for families, the 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom cottage which was part of the original stable building, has been converted to a lovely light-filled space.  The open plan cottage & features a small kitchen & terrace with a breathtaking view of the park.

title: THE EMAKOKO
description:
The Emakoko, an owner-managed boutique hotel, boasts a spectacular location on the border of Nairobi National Park & is only a 45-minute drive from Jomo Kenyatta Airport.
It is hard to believe that only a few minutes from the city’s hustle & bustle you can find an authentic safari lodge that offers thrilling game drives & encounters with endangered animals.
The Emakoko is a wonderful pre or post-safari choice & offers the perfect blend between exciting safari activities & interesting city excursions.

Accommodation comprises 10 rooms & a private house.  
The beautifully appointed en-suite rooms have private verandas that overlook the game park with its abundant wildlife.
There are 5 rooms on the same level as the main areas & a further 5 rooms positioned on top of the cliff, overlooking the valley.  
Communal areas include a swimming pool, spa, bar & barbeque area.

title: THE GIRAFFE MANOR
description:
Offering an experience like no other, the charming Giraffe Manor is set within 140 acres of indigenous forest in Karen, an upscale neighbourhood in Nairobi.
Yes, that photo you have seen so many times on Instagram where guests are hand-feeding a giraffe that is peeking its head through a window – happens here daily.
Guests can find friendly giraffes in the most interesting places, like at the breakfast table, or your room window. (if you have one of the front rooms)  
Now animal lovers can tick giraffe interactions off their bucket list.

Giraffe House has 2 wings – Manor House that was built in 1932 & Garden Manor that was added in 2011.    
Each has 5 superior rooms & 1 suite, bringing the total number of rooms to 10 superior rooms & 2 suites.
All rooms have beautiful en-suite bathrooms & private verandas, whereas the suites come complete with living & lounge spaces as well as a second sleeping area (second bedroom or loft) for children.
The main area features a sitting room – ideal for tea-time, with large windows so guests can enjoy beautiful views of the giraffes & the surrounding sanctuary.  
The sunroom is where breakfast is served – to guests & to giraffes who love to poke their long necks through the enormous windows to see what’s on your plate.

title: CASTERBRIDGE HOLLOW
description:
With an ideal setting in White River, along the scenic Panorama Route, Casterbridge Hollow Boutique Hotel provides an ideal base from which to explore this spectacular self-drive route that leaves travellers from across the globe in awe & wonder.
The popular Panorama Route includes the renowned God’s Window look-out point, Blyde River Canyon, the interesting town of Pilgrim’s Rest, Mac Mac Waterfalls & Bourkes Luck Potholes, along with many other scenic stops.
The region is also a popular overnight spot for safari-goers who are on their way to Kruger National Park or for those who want a relaxing post-safari scenic experience.
Right next door to Casterbridge Hollow, you will find the Casterbridge Lifestyle Centre where guests can wine & dine to their hearts’ content & browse through their interesting boutiques & galleries.

Casterbridge Hollow Boutique Hotel features 24 deluxe rooms & 4 family rooms, all boasting beautiful views of the pool & gardens.
Each room features air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.  The family rooms consist of 2 inter-leading bedrooms, each complete with an en-suite bathroom, which make these units ideal for families travelling with young children.  The bathrooms contain both a bath & shower.
A sparkling rim-flow pool seamlessly merges with the gardens to provide the ultimate invitation to relax & unwind.  Communal areas also include a restaurant, cocktail bar & library.  
For health-conscious guests, there is a fully equipped gym & pilates studio in the Lifestyle Centre next door.  Spa treatments are also on offer amid a variety of boutique shops & restaurants.

title: OLIVER’S LODGE
description:
Just around the corner from the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Oliver’s Lodge & Restaurant is an ideal base from which to explore the scenic Panorama Route with its many outdoor activities & attractions.
The popular Panorama Route includes the renowned God’s Window look-out point, Blyde River Canyon, the interesting town of Pilgrim’s Rest, Mac Mac Waterfalls & Bourkes Luck Potholes, along with many other scenic stops.
This family-owned Austrian-styled lodge is set in landscaped gardens with beautiful views across White River Golf Course – the cherry on top to avid golfers.  All the facilities of this 18-hole championship golf course are available to guests at Oliver’s.  These include tennis & squash courts.
Oliver Lodge’s guests can also play the world-renowned Leopard Creek Golf Course, usually reserved for members only.  
Their ever-popular Oliver’s Restaurant is considered by Wine magazine as one of the ‘Top 100 Restaurants of South Africa’

Accommodation at Oliver’s comprises 4 standard rooms, 5 luxury rooms, 2 executive suites, 2 two-bedroom cottages & a 4-bedroom house.
The standard rooms are individually styled & include a separate bath & shower while the luxury rooms feature a sitting room with a fireplace & patio with views over the pool or golf course.  Each spacious executive suite offers a cosy fireplace, separate lounge & private balcony with views over the garden, pool & golf course. The 2-bedroom & 4-bedroom houses are ideal for families travelling with children.

title: PERRY’S BRIDGE HOLLOW
description:
Set in beautiful gardens in a colonial-style shopping village called Perry’s Bridge Trading Post, you will find a country-style hotel that offers an ideal base from which to explore South Africa’s Lowveld region.
Perrys’ Bridge Hollow is situated just outside the town of Hazyview & provides a comfortable night’s rest for guests en-route to the world-renowned Kruger National Park.
The popular Panorama Route includes the renowned God’s Window look-out point, Blyde River Canyon, the interesting town of Pilgrim’s Rest, Mac Mac Waterfalls & Bourkes Luck Potholes, along with many other scenic stops.
With spacious cottages, warm hospitality & an outstanding setting, this boutique hotel is a great choice for families looking for a central base to the region’s activities & attractions.

Perry’s Bridge Hollow offers 31 deluxe rooms & 3 family suites, all equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The sophisticated, spacious deluxe rooms are set in beautiful indigenous gardens & feature private patios as well as indoor & outdoor showers.  In addition, each family suite also includes a lounge area as well as a king bed, single bed & sleeper sofa for the kids.
Lodge facilities include a sparkling swimming pool, wellness spa, gym, bar & restaurant.

title: TANAMERA LODGE
description:
Tanamera Lodge is nestled on the slopes of the Sabie River valley in Hazyview along the scenic Panorama Route in South Africa’s Lowveld.
The popular Panorama Route includes the renowned God’s Window look-out point, Blyde River Canyon, the interesting town of Pilgrim’s Rest, Mac Mac Waterfalls & Bourkes Luck Potholes, along with many other scenic stops.
The lodge is a honeymooner’s paradise!  From the deck & all the suites, guests can enjoy breathtaking views of the forest & valley while private plunge pools are the cherry on top.
Tanamera Lodge is close to the Panorama Route’s most popular attractions & activities, making this an ideal base from which to explore the Lowveld en-route to Kruger National Park.

Accommodation at Tanamera comprises 7 luxury suites, including forest suites, river suites & honeymoon suites.  
The forest suites include a lounge & dining area with a cosy fireplace, a double walk-in shower with a waterfall feature as well as a private patio with a sunken plunge pool & outdoor shower.  The river suites are surrounded by unspoilt bush & are perfectly suited for a romantic stay.  These suites are complete with a huge stone bath & waterfall shower as well as a private plunge pool.
Each of the honeymoon chalets includes a lounge & dining room with a fireplace, a large private deck with a magnificent view over the river as well as a private plunge pool & outdoor shower.
The tastefully decorated lodge features a dining room with a wood-burning stone fireplace & lounge area as well as a bar & main deck with an infinity pool offering captivating views of the Sabie River Valley.

title: WALKERSON’S HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Situated in the beautiful town of Dullstroom, in the heart of the scenic Panorama Route in South Africa’s Lowveld, you will find Walkerson’s Hotel & Spa.
Set on a 1,500-acre sporting estate close to Dullstroom – a town surrounded by rolling hills & lakes – this country-style hotel is the ideal base from which to explore the region’s activities & attractions.
Dullstroom sits halfway between Johannesburg & the Kruger National Park & provides the perfect overnight stop if you are travelling either way.
The area is known for its excellent fly-fishing & other outdoor activities like hiking, horse riding & picnicking.

Walkerson’s Hotel features 14 lakeside suites, 11 luxury lakeside suites & 1 honeymoon suite.  
Each lakeside suite has a lounge area with a cosy fireplace as well as a patio with gorgeous views over the lake.  In addition, the luxury lakeside suites offer both indoor & outdoor bathrooms.  Walkerson’s romantic honeymoon suite boasts a fireplace, jacuzzi & private patio with beautiful views over the lake.
Hotel facilities include a sparkling swimming pool, wellness spa, restaurant, cocktail bar & gym.

title: BATONKA LODGE
description:
The owner-run Batonka Lodge is set within easily walking distance to the majestic Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe.
This small & elegant retreat offers good value & comfortable inter-leading rooms, which makes this a first choice for families traveling with children.  
Seeing the majestic Victoria Falls is on everyone’s bucket list!  Not only can guests view the thundering waterfall from up-close, they can also enjoy a variety of exciting activities in Africa’s adventure capital.

Batonka Lodge has 22 garden-view suites, each designed with privacy in mind.  Each air-conditioned suite includes an en-suite bathroom with indoor shower.  Some of the rooms also have additional bathtubs.  
All suites have private verandas that opens onto the surrounding lawns.  There are a number of inter-leading rooms that make Batonka ideal for families.  
The indoor living space at Batonka comprises a dining room, lounge, fireplace & a stepped garden with swimming pool.
The main outdoor area features a large veranda for enjoying cheerful breakfasts & pre-dinner drinks.  There is also a bar area under a shady canopy as well as an outdoor lounge.

title: ILALA LODGE
description:
Ilala Lodge is ideally situated on the Zimbabwean side of the mighty Zambezi River, only a short walk from the magnificent Victoria Falls.
The perfect base from which to explore one of the World’s Seven Natural Wonders, Ilala Lodge is the closest resort to the majestic Vic Falls.  
Restaurant guests can see & hear the roar of “the smoke that thunders” in the background while enjoying some of Zimbabwe’s finest cuisine.

Accommodation at Ilala Lodge comprises 34 standard rooms, 20 deluxe rooms, 2 standard suites, 3 executive suites & 1 penthouse suite.
In the standard rooms, double French doors open out to a communal garden where wild animals are often spotted.  The deluxe rooms are slightly larger than the standard rooms, with more refined interiors.
The standard suites both have balconies where guests can relax on the comfortable chairs & table provided.  The executive suites have 2 bedrooms, a lounge & private patio with beautiful sunrise views.
The penthouse suite comes complete with private lounge, kitchen, walk-in shower, private balcony with large spa bath while enjoying world-class views of the spray rising above the mighty Victoria Falls waterfall.  This suite can also be turned into a family villa by also booking the next-door deluxe room with inter-leading door.
The main area features a poolside bar, restaurant & spa.

title: MATETSI VICTORIA FALLS
description:
Matetsi Victoria Falls is set on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River within a private game reserve on the Zimbabwean side of the Falls.
Matetsi allows guests to combine an action-packed visit to Victoria Falls with a luxurious safari.  
The lodge is located an hour’s drive from the majestic Vic Falls, so after a morning out visiting the Falls, guests can enjoy the tranquility, beautiful scenery & excellent game viewing of Matetsi Victoria Falls.
The discerning traveler looking for a refined vacation will love Matetsi.  And because there are 2 large inter-leading suites, it is also ideal for family getaways.

Matetsi Victoria Falls comprises 16 suites, 2 family suite & 1 villa, each equipped with air-conditioning & en-suite bathroom.
The suites have generous bathtubs, indoor & outdoor rain showers as well as a private deck with plunge pool boasting magnificent views over the bush.
The family suites have the same amenities as the suites, but consists of 2 bedrooms, with adjoining passageway via a secure courtyard.
The villa is for exclusive use & comes with 4 bedrooms, kitchen, indoor & outdoor dining areas leading to a spacious veranda with swimming pool & fire pit bowl.  The villa also includes a private chef, butler, guide & safari vehicle.
The main lodge area at Matetsi includes a bar, dining room, lounge, gym, spa, library & Kids Club.

title: ROVOS RAIL
description:
Rovos Rail offers a luxury train holiday like no other.  
Apart from owning & operating the most luxurious trains in the world, Rovos Rail offers guests a variety of train journeys - each ranging from 2 nights to 2 weeks.
Short train trips include travelling from Cape Town to Pretoria or north to the majestic Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe.  The longest & most famous route is an epic rail journey that starts in Cape Town & passes through some of Africa’s most magnificent scenery to Dar es Salaam.
Elegant train carriages, spacious suites & fine dining is what the Rovos Rail journeys are all about.  For many guests, a real highlight of their Rovos experience is the 4-course suave dinners – a jacket-&-tie affair that never disappoints.
Everything is included in a Rovos Rail journey – all meals, drinks, snacks, high teas & even off-train activities & excursions, so guests can sit back & relax in style.
Rohan Vos started Rovos Rail in 1989 (hence the name) & is still very much involved in the company, endeavouring to personally welcome every guest arriving & departing from Rovos’ private train station in Pretoria.

Rovos Rail boasts 3 suite types that are the perfect balance between vintage carriages & modern luxury.  Pullman suites are 7 sq meters, Deluxe suites are 10 sq meters & Royal Suites are 16 sq meters.
All suites have fittings & furnishings of the highest standard & include en-suite bathrooms with a shower, toilet, basin & bath (Royal suites only).
The observation car seats 32 passengers & comprises an open-air balcony, big pictures windows, a bar, sofas & booths.

title: STANLEY &amp; LIVINGSTONE BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
The Stanley & Livingstone is a small boutique hotel with only 16 suites set in a 6 000-acre private game reserve about 10km from Victoria Falls on the Zimbabwean side.
A safari hotel in Victorian style reflects the old-world charm of that bygone era.  
This stylish & elegant boutique hotel offers luxurious accommodation & exciting activities combined with superb service & culinary cuisine.

Accommodation at The Stanley & Livingstone comprises 16 air-conditioned luxurious suites.  Each suite offers an en-suite Victorian-style bathroom with walk-in shower & slipper bath as well as a lounge area & private veranda.
Other hotel facilities include a dining room, lounge, bar, Kids Club & swimming pool with spectacular views over the waterhole.  Guests can laze around at the pool or enjoy cocktails within full view of the surrounding wildlife.
There is also a sundeck terrace that is used for al fresco dining under the stars.

title: THE ELEPHANT CAMP
description:
The Elephant Camp is located within in a private concession, a short drive from the magnificent Victoria Falls on the Zimbabwean side of the Zambezi River.
The camp overlooks a waterhole that is fed by natural streams in the rainy season that rush down to meet the Masuwe River & the Zambezi gorges below the Falls. 
Breathtaking views of the Victoria Falls’ spray can be enjoyed from the camp’s viewing deck.  This luxury & intimate lodge under canvas is within easy reach of Victoria Falls, yet secluded in its own private game reserve where close-up encounters with wildlife can be enjoyed.

Here, the emphasis is on luxury & exclusivity.  The camp has 2 wings, The Elephant Camp Main which consists of 12 luxury suites & The Elephant Camp West consisting of only 4 suites.
All suites are gorge facing & enjoy private viewing decks & plunge pools.
Each suite also has a private lounge area, air-conditioning & fan, an en-suite bathroom with bath as well as inside & outside showers.
The main tent of The Elephant Camp features a comfortable & tastefully decorated lounge area & bar that opens onto a spacious deck – all with sweeping views of Batoka Gorge & the spray of Victoria Falls.

title: THE VICTORIA FALLS HOTEL
description:
The Victoria Falls Hotel, also known as “the grand old lady of the Falls,” is situated in the Victoria Falls National Park, a World Heritage Site on the Zimbabwean side of the Zambezi River.
The Edwardian-style 5-star hotel was built in 1904 & is a proud member of the exclusive Leading Hotels of the World group.  For more than 110 years The Victoria Falls Hotel has been a luxury icon in Africa.
Set in lush tropical gardens with lily ponds, palm trees & semi-tropical shrubs, The Victoria Falls Hotel provides the tranquility & seclusion that many guests seek, while only being a short drive away from the majestic Victoria Falls.

The hotel boasts 161 rooms, comprising 37 standard rooms, 58 traditional rooms, 48 deluxe rooms, 7 junior suites, 4 honeymoon suites, 6 executive suites & the Royal Suite.  
The main area features a large swimming pool, 2 tennis courts, a library & reading rooms where guests can relax while sipping on cocktail or cup of coffee.  
There is also an opulent Livingstone Room for fine dining & dancing, the Jungle Junction with its famous breakfast & dinner buffets & marvelous entertainment evenings as well as Stanley’s Terrace, with its clear view of the Victoria Falls Bridge, connecting Zimbabwe & Zambia.

title: VICTORIA FALLS RIVER LODGE
description:
Overlooking the mighty Zambezi River, Victoria Falls River Lodge was Zambezi National Park’s very first private game lodge.  
Its amazing location – so close to the majestic Victoria Falls – offers guests the unique opportunity to see the spray of the Falls in the distance!
With uninterrupted views & an idyllic riverside setting, Victoria Falls River Lodge never fails to impress.  Besides excellent wildlife viewing, luxurious accommodation & fine dining, guests will have quick access to one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World & all its adventure activities.

Victoria Falls River Lodge boasts 13 luxury tented suites (of which 5 are family units), 6 island treehouse suites, set apart on a private island as well as 2 star bed treehouses raised on a rooftop deck.
Each of the luxury thatched tented suites is constructed of canvas, glass & timber & extends out onto a private deck with its own splash pool.  Here, guests can enjoy uninterrupted views of the Zambezi River & natural bush.  
Family tents are similar, but also include an adjoining room with either a single & a bunk bed or twin beds.
The island treehouse suites, as the name suggests, are set on a private island & are ideal for guests looking for a highly exclusive experience (aged 16 years & older) while each of the double-storey star bed treehouses features an open-air rooftop deck with a sitting area & a signature star bed suspended above the treetops. 
The main lodge boasts a swimming pool & an open-plan dining & sitting area that offers sensational views of the Zambezi.

title: BIRKENHEAD HOUSE
description:
Set on dramatic cliffs in Hermanus, with stunning views of Walker Bay, Birkenhead House is an opulent & luxurious beachfront retreat that offers some of the best land-based whale watching in the world.
Tastefully designed & decorated by the owner, Liz Biden, the retreat is the epitome of elegant seaside luxury.
Birkenhead House is a honeymooner’s paradise - offering breathtaking views, relaxing spa treatments, sublime cuisine, impeccable service & romantic turn-downs.
An all-inclusive rate allows guests to indulge from morning to evening while relaxing days can be spent at one of the elegant swimming pools – one located in a beautiful courtyard & the other overlooking the ocean.

Birkenhead House offers a selection of luxurious suites. All 11 suites, including the honeymoon suite, are spacious & offer spectacular views. Most suites have their own balcony & are luxuriously furnished with all the comforts you would need during your stay. One suite even has its own private pool & patio area.
The main area comprises 2 swimming pools, one located in the courtyard & the other an infinity pool set on the beachfront deck with panoramic views over the ocean. There are plenty of sun loungers scattered around the pools where lazy afternoons can be spent reading a book or sipping on a delicious cocktail.
On warm evenings, dinner is served under the stars & on cooler evenings, in the indoor dining area with large glass windows overlooking the bay. There is also a comfortable lounge area with stunning views over the ocean where pre-dinner drinks can be enjoyed.

title: FARM 215
description:
Farm 215 is a luxurious eco-friendly farm retreat that is so unique, it is in a class of its own.  Located off-the-beaten-track along the Whale Coast, guests will be immersed in nature – an ideal place to switch off & truly relax.
Designed in keeping with its beautiful surroundings, Farm 215’s elegant suites boast lovely views over the fynbos reserve & an organic vegetable & herb garden produces fresh farm-to-table meals.
Completely off-the-beaten-track, yet close enough to the best land-based whale watching in the world, this farm retreat is passionate about the conservation of the Cape Floral Kingdom & its rich wildlife.

Farm 215 consists of Homestead rooms & Fynbos suites.  
The Homestead rooms are located within the main homestead & offer spacious & luxurious accommodation.  Two of the rooms are located on the first floor & offer gorgeous views from their balconies, while the third room is located on the ground floor & offers slightly more space, as well as a private garden & covered terrace.
The fynbos suites offer a true Farm 215 experience.  They are incredibly spacious, totally private & spaced out along a meandering pathway with captivating views over the reserve.  These solar-powered suites are open-plan & boast a sundeck, as well as a lounge & en-suite bathroom.  Each suite also has a fireplace for cosy winter evenings.
The bar & dining area opens onto an expansive terrace where guests can enjoy beautiful views of nature while sipping a fine Cape wine.  There is also a 25m heated lap-pool for lazy afternoons.

title: GROOTBOS FOREST LODGE
description:
Grootbos Nature Reserve is a private eco-reserve located on the beautiful Whale Coast & boasts 
three 5-star accommodation options, each designed to reflect the exquisite natural setting without compromising on style & luxury.
Grootbos Forest Lodge offers a serene & sophisticated haven – ideal for honeymooners, couples or romantics while Grootbos Garden Lodge is a wonderful choice for families.  Grootbos Private Villas are the last word in secluded luxury & come complete with a private chef, butler & nature guide.
Grootbos Nature Reserve features 2,500 hectares of pristine wilderness & overlooks the Atlantic Ocean & Overberg Mountains.  This award-winning reserve is sophisticated, luxurious & has a strong focus on conservation & sustainable tourism.
Discerning travellers can enjoy a wide selection of inclusive activities as well as amazing cuisine – fresh from the Grootbos garden.

Forest Lodge is ideal for honeymooners or romantics as the 16 one-bedroom suites are all tucked within the forest & enjoy spectacular views over the reserve.  
Each air-conditioned forest suite features an en-suite bathroom with a double shower & bath, a separate lounge with a cosy fireplace as well as a private deck with outdoor showers overlooking Walker Bay.  Two of the 16 suites also have a private plunge pool on the deck.  
Unbeatable views can be enjoyed from all rooms in the suite.
Communal areas include a swimming pool, a wellness spa, a dining & bar area as well as an activity desk.

title: GROOTBOS GARDEN LODGE
description:
Grootbos Nature Reserve is a private eco-reserve located on the beautiful Whale Coast & boasts 
three 5-star accommodation options, each designed to reflect the exquisite natural setting without compromising on style & luxury.
