Grootbos Forest Lodge offers a serene & sophisticated haven – ideal for honeymooners, couples or romantics while Grootbos Garden Lodge is a wonderful choice for families.  Grootbos Private Villas are the last word in secluded luxury & come complete with a private chef, butler & nature guide.
Grootbos Nature Reserve features 2,500 hectares of pristine wilderness & overlooks the Atlantic Ocean & Overberg Mountains.  This award-winning reserve is sophisticated, luxurious & has a strong focus on conservation & sustainable tourism.
Discerning travellers can enjoy a wide selection of inclusive activities as well as amazing cuisine – fresh from the Grootbos garden.

Garden Lodge is ideal for families & the suites are set between lush fynbos & a Milkwood forest.  There are only 11 private one-bedroom suites & 2 two-bedroom suites that are a comfortable choice for parents who are travelling with younger children.  
Each one-bedroom suite features an en-suite bathroom, a separate lounge with a fireplace as well as a private outdoor deck overlooking Walker Bay.  
Each of the two-bedroom suites epitomizes luxurious home-from-home comforts, featuring 2 private, en-suite bedrooms (one with a shower & one with bath), a separate lounge & dining area & a private outdoor deck overlooking Walker Bay.
Communal areas include a swimming pool, a wellness spa, a library, a dining & bar area as well as an activity desk.

title: GROOTBOS PRIVATE VILLAS
description:
Grootbos Nature Reserve is a private eco-reserve located on the beautiful Whale Coast & boasts 
three 5-star accommodation options, each designed to reflect the exquisite natural setting without compromising on style & luxury.
Grootbos Forest Lodge offers a serene & sophisticated haven – ideal for honeymooners, couples or romantics while Grootbos Garden Lodge is a wonderful choice for families.  Grootbos Private Villas are the last word in secluded luxury & come complete with a private chef, butler & nature guide.
Grootbos Nature Reserve features 2,500 hectares of pristine wilderness & overlooks the Atlantic Ocean & Overberg Mountains.  This award-winning reserve is sophisticated, luxurious & has a strong focus on conservation & sustainable tourism.
Discerning travellers can enjoy a wide selection of inclusive activities as well as amazing cuisine – fresh from the Grootbos garden.

Grootbos Private Villas offer 2 sophisticated exclusive-use options that are hidden in a natural wonderland of the Grootbos Private Nature Reserve.  
The first private villa consists of 2 luxury suites & the second villa has 4 luxury suites, each offering breathtaking views.  Each villa boasts a state-of-the-art kitchen & large living area as well as a pool, a gym, a wine cellar & a private airstrip.  
The 2-bedroom villa also features a cinema & media room while the 4-bedroom villa features a sauna, relaxation room & an entertainment room.

title: LEKKERWATER BEACH LODGE
description:
Set in a beautiful corner of the De Hoop Nature Reserve, Lekkerwater Beach Lodge offers guests a modern, eco-friendly stay in a spectacular ocean-front location.
The area is renowned for its excellent land-based whale watching, but against the backdrop of flower-filled fynbos vegetation & distant purple mountains, De Hoop is also home to other animals like baboons, ostriches & eland as well as dolphins, tortoises & sea birds.
Easily reached via self-drive, Lekkerwater (translated as ‘the place of good water’), lies less than a 4-hour drive from Cape Town or the Winelands, which makes this an ideal stop on a Cape Town to Garden Route self-drive itinerary.
The lodge is a wonderful fit for all types of travellers – from couples, honeymooners & families with young children to wildlife enthusiasts, bird watchers & nature photographers.

Lekkerwater Beach Lodge offers an intimate & off-the-beaten-track beachfront experience.  There are only 7 suites, scattered along 6km of pristine white-sand beaches, one of which is a family unit.
Each suite boasts a private deck, offering uninterrupted views of the azure Indian Ocean & each year between July & November, guests may have the opportunity to witness whales breach in the bay as they migrate from Antarctica.
The beautiful floor-to-ceiling glass windows & wood-burning fireplaces complete each suite, along with open-plan en-suite showers offering a private peek at the ocean.  
The family suite consists of 2 bedrooms & a shared bathroom with an open-plan shower.  Kids have their own private loft – a magical little haven for young travellers.
At the main lodge, you will find a comfortable lounge with a fireplace, a dining room & a large deck with a swimming pool.

title: MORUKURU OCEAN HOUSE
description:
Boasting a secluded setting in the pristine De Hoop Nature Reserve, Morukuru Ocean House is an exclusive-use beach villa that offers an unspoilt, private & luxurious stay.
The area is renowned for its excellent land-based whale watching, but against the backdrop of flower-filled fynbos vegetation & distant purple mountains, De Hoop is also home to other animals like baboons, ostriches & eland as well as dolphins, tortoises & sea birds.
Easily reached via self-drive, Morukuru Ocean House lies less than a 4-hour drive from Cape Town or the Winelands, which makes this an ideal stop on a Cape Town to Garden Route self-drive itinerary.
The lodge is a wonderful choice for discerning travellers who are looking for a private beach experience with exceptional service.  The villa comes complete with a private chef, guide & housekeeper & guests also have the option to fly in by charter from Cape Town International Airport.

The beach house sleeps up to 8 adults & 4 children in total luxury.  This eco-friendly family-friendly villa comprises 4 suites & 1 children’s bedroom that can accommodate up to 4 children.
The suites at Morukuru Ocean House have large glass doors overlooking the Indian Ocean as well as en-suite bathrooms with bath, separate shower & double basins.
The children’s room offers a large flatscreen television & Playstation, as well as a selection of board games & other fun activities.  Kids sleeping here will have to share a bathroom with their parents.  
The outdoor area at Morukuru Ocean House is designed to be wind-free & the upper-storey bar & living room boast 360-degree views of the surrounding landscape.  There is also an adjacent sun deck complete with a swimming pool & ‘blow up’ sofas – an ideal spot for sundowners & whale watching.

title: OCEAN ELEVEN GUEST HOUSE
description:
Ocean Eleven Guest House is located within the heart of whale-watching country on a fynbos-covered, ocean-facing cliff in Hermanus – one of the most sought-after locations along the Whale Route.  
From this elegant beach house, exceptional views across Walker Bay can be enjoyed.  
Right on your doorstep, you will find interesting & exciting walking paths overlooking the ocean, so Ocean Eleven guests can walk for miles on end while taking in the breathtaking beauty of this scenic seaside town.
Hermanus is the heart of the Whale Route & boasts the best land-based whale watching in the world between July & November.  
Guests can spot these amazing creatures right in front of the guest house as tall windows & large glass doors open onto a breakfast deck with gorgeous ocean views.

Ocean Eleven boasts 10 en-suite rooms, each with beautiful views of Walker Bay.  Three of these are standard rooms, 5 are deluxe rooms & 2 are suites.
Some of the rooms have private balconies or doors that open onto the garden.  There are also 2 loft-style suites that are incredibly spacious, both featuring full en-suite bathrooms & private balconies with panoramic views of Walker Bay.
The main area comprises an indoor dining area, lounge, outdoor terrace with a swimming pool where lazy afternoons can be spent reading a book or cooling off with a cocktail in hand.

title: ONE MARINE DRIVE BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
One Marine Drive Boutique Hotel is situated on the oceanfront of Hermanus – a quaint coastal town that offers the best land-based whale watching in the world.
Small & intimate, this boutique hotel offers only 5 suites with sensational views over the ocean -the perfect place from which to witness frolicking whales between July & November each year.
Within walking distance, you will find the seaside town’s exciting shops, art galleries, restaurants, bars & markets, as well as the famous Cliff Path – the very place where whales are spotted each day in season.
Nearby, guests can enjoy wine tasting at one of 14 estates or play a round of golf at the 27-hole course with only the mountain as a backdrop.

One Marine Drive Boutique Hotel features 8 individually decorated suites with en-suite bathrooms.
There are sea view rooms, garden view rooms & pool view suites – all with balconies or terraces looking out over either the ocean, garden or pool.
The boutique hotel features a heated swimming pool in a secluded courtyard garden as well as a cosy living & dining area with a log burning fireplace for chilly, winter evenings.

title: SCHULPHOEK HOUSE
description:
Sculphoek House is located within the protected sanctuary of Schulphoek Bay, just outside the charming seaside town of Hermanus.  
Situated right on the beach, Schulphoek does not only offer spectacular views of the ocean but also provides the ideal spot to enjoy excellent whale watching from the comfort of the lounge or outside terrace.
An extra value-add is the surprising complimentary 4-course dinner waiting for you on your 1st night.  Meals have been freshly prepared with ingredients from the garden while excellent South African wines can be enjoyed from their wide selection.

Schulphoek House provides 15 elegant suites, some ocean-facing & some garden-facing.
Each suite is individually decorated, boasting fine linens, goose-down duvets & en-suite bathrooms. Rooms are spacious & offer either sweeping views of the bay or a patio that walks out into the quiet gardens.
Communal areas include a peaceful library with a selection of books & a comfortable lounge to unwind &, during whale season, spot southern right whales in the ocean from the comfort of the sofas.  
This eco-conscious boutique hotel also features a swimming pool with sun loungers & an open-plan kitchen that allows guests to see the resident chef at work.  Schulphoek also has an impressive wine collection of over 7,000 wines.

title: THE MARINE
description:
The Marine is a landmark in Hermanus - a quaint little seaside town along South Africa’s beautiful Whale Route.  
This ocean-front property boasts a spectacular clifftop setting with captivating views of Walker Bay & its frolicking whales.  Between July & November each year, guests can experience the best land-based whale watching in the world from the comfort of the deck.
The Marine serves multiple award-winning cuisine & an indulgent spa that offers a wide selection of relaxing treatments.
Within walking distance, you will find a variety of shops, cafes & restaurants as well as the famous Cliff Path – Hermanus’ best whale watching spot!

Accommodation at The Marine comprises 20 double rooms, 10 luxury double rooms with sea view & 10 premier suites.
Each of the double rooms comes with an en-suite bathroom, air-conditioning & underfloor heating.  In addition, some double rooms open out onto private balconies.
The luxury double rooms feature comfortable seating areas from where guests can enjoy some whale spotting in season.  In addition, several of the rooms include a balcony with breathtaking views of the ocean.
The beautifully decorated premier suites boast spacious sitting areas with gorgeous ocean views.  Some of these suites also include fireplaces & private balconies with views over Walker Bay.
Hotel facilities include a heated swimming pool, cocktail bar & sun lounge where pre-dinner drinks can be enjoyed as well as a restaurant, gym & wellness spa.

title: THE THATCH HOUSE
description:
Situated on the water’s edge behind the Cape Fold Mountains, The Thatch House is a country-style boutique hotel that sits on 7 acres of private land, with direct access to a beautiful lagoon.
Between July & November each year, Hermanus is known to offer the best land-based whale watching in the world, so families, groups of friends & discerning travellers choose this elegant & peaceful retreat as their Whale Coast haven.
This boutique hotel has been designed to showcase the natural beauty of the surrounding landscape while still retaining the warm, home-away-from-home family-style atmosphere.  
Guests will have a wide selection of facilities to take advantage of, including 2 swimming pools, a tennis court, putting green & children’s playroom – as well as an in-house chef & full-time staff.  
The Thatch House can also be booked on an exclusive-use basis by large groups or multi-generational families who are travelling together.

The Thatch House consists of 4 two-bedroom suites & 2 one-bedroom suites. 
The two-bedroom suites can sleep 4 people, so are ideal for families.  These suites include separate lounge areas & private patios with beautiful views over either the lagoon or manicured gardens.
The one-bedroom suites open out onto beautiful gardens.  One of these suites includes an extra sofa bed for 2 children.  
The Thatch House boasts 2 swimming pools, a floodlit tennis court, a putting green 7 a croquet lawn.  There is also a jungle gym, games room with snooker table & movies as well as a small gym complete with jacuzzi.  Communal areas also include a lounge & dining area, cocktail bar, library & TV room.

title: THE HILTON WINDHOEK
description:
The Hilton Windhoek is located within the heart of Windhoek, Namibia’s capital city.  The hotel promises modern, lavish accommodation & world-renowned hospitality.
The Hilton brand is renowned for its excellent hospitality, good choice of restaurants, luxurious accommodation & family-friendly atmosphere – it is no wonder that many discerning travellers choose to spend a few nights here.

There are 150 rooms at The Hilton Windhoek, all spacious & adorned in modern & inviting African décor.
 The room categories are king rooms, executive rooms, junior suites & presidential suites.  The king rooms offer en-suite bathrooms with rain showers.  The other room types are more spacious & offer separate dining areas & spectacular views over the city.  
In addition to 3 restaurants, The Hilton Windhoek also offers 2 coffee shops & a deli.  The hotel also features an outdoor pool, a wellness spa & a fitness facility.

title: OMAANDA
description:
Omaanda is a unique lodge located within a private nature reserve a short drive from Windhoek’s Hosea Kutako International & Eros Domestic Airports.
Omaanda is the ideal stop-over before or after a Namibia safari & especially an ideal choice for guests who are looking for a nature-based stay, away from the city’s hustle & bustle.
Set in a 9,000-hectare Namibian wilderness, guests will have privileged access to a conservation reserve that offers incredible wildlife viewing & an authentic, local experience.

There are 10 air-conditioned thatched chalets at Omaanda, each modelled on local Owambo huts & featuring en-suite bathrooms.
Two of these chalets are larger & can sleep up to 6 guests, making them ideal for families.
The lodge has a traditional feel but is modern in design – offering world-class facilities such as Wi-Fi, a Bluetooth television in each room, a heated pool & a wellness spa.
The main lodge is home to an open-sided lounge, bar & dining area as well as an outdoor deck with a heated swimming pool & sun loungers offering spectacular views over the hills & mountains.

title: THE OLIVE EXCLUSIVE
description:
Contemporary & stylish, The Olive Exclusive is tucked away in a quiet corner of Windhoek – Namibia’s capital city.
Small & intimate, The Olive Exclusive is a luxurious choice for the discerning traveller hoping to stay over in Windhoek before or after a Namibia safari, & the ideal base from which to explore the city & surrounds.

The Olive Exclusive has 7 individually decorated suites, reflecting the different regions in Namibia.  
Each suite has a lounge area with a fireplace, a dining room for in-room dining as well as a spacious deck with a day bed & private plunge pool.
The restaurant at The Olive boasts a seasonal menu, offering inventive & signature dishes & the well-stocked bar features a classic selection of fine whisky & premium wines.

title: BABYLONSTOREN
description:
Babylonstoren is everything but ordinary.  One of the oldest Cape Dutch farms, this elegant home offers a simplistic, yet luxurious farm-style experience.  
So much more than just a farm, Babylonstoren loves to provide their guests with a personal, authentic – yet luxurious stay by allowing guests to get involved in some exciting farm activities, like fruit picking in season or tasting food prepared fresh from their garden.
In fact, here guests can experience the Winelands’ best farm-to-table kitchen concept in a relaxed, farm-style setting.
Ideal for couples, honeymooners or families, Babylonstoren offers a little something for everyone.  The farm dam & restored reservoir are ideal swimming spots in summer & guests can even cycle through the vineyards or simply take a stroll through the beautiful Babylonstoren gardens.

Small & intimate, Babylonstoren only consists of 22 cottages & suites to ensure a private, exclusive stay.  There are 6 one-bedroom suites, 3 one-bedroom cottages, 4 two-bedroom cottages & 9 farmhouse suites. 
The suites & cottages are built in traditional Cape Dutch style, with white-washed walls, thatched roofs & clean, contemporary interiors.  High ceilings, white decor & hand-picked furniture give the rooms a modern feel while maintaining the historical flair.
The tea garden provides delicious lunches, while the renowned Babel restaurant remains a favourite for its interesting food combinations.  Other areas include a gym, library, bar, wellness spa & swimming pool.

title: BONNE ESPERANCE
description:
With a prestigious setting in the heart of the historical town of Stellenbosch, lies Bonne Esperance, an award-winning boutique hotel & one of the Winelands’ best-kept secrets.
Stellenbosch is known for its majestic mountains, opulent vineyards, fascinating art & culture as well as its world-class gastronomy & wine. 
With an unmatching location, Bonne Esperance is located within meters from an array of restaurants, cafes & boutiques, offering guests the opportunity to stroll through the leafy streets of Stellenbosch at their own pace.
Owner-managed & run, guests can expect warm hospitality & exceptional service throughout their stay.

Bonne Esperance offers two luxurious accommodation options. Guests can either opt for beautiful rooms that include breakfast or one of the elegant self-catering apartments.
The 18 individually styled rooms include 9 deluxe balcony rooms, 5 classic rooms, 2 loft rooms & 2 petite single rooms, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The spacious deluxe balcony rooms either have a balcony or patio, all of which overlook the central courtyard & swimming pool.  The classic rooms are comfortable & located on the ground floor or first floor while the Victorian-style loft rooms are ideal for couples & include a seating space for 2.  The petite rooms are located next to the communal areas & are perfect for single travellers.
Bonne Esperance also has a selection of luxury self-catering apartments, including 6 studios, 1 honeymoon studio & a one-bedroom apartment.
Communal areas include a cosy lounge & dining area, a swimming pool, wellness spa & relaxing outdoor patio.

title: CLOUDS ESTATE
description:
Clouds Estate, as the name suggests, is set high on the Helshoogte Mountain pass, enjoying spectacular views over the Stellenbosch valley below.  
This Winelands estate boasts an excellent location close to the charming town of Stellenbosch & the beautiful Franschhoek village.
Several top South African restaurants are in close driving distance, so guests can tantalize their taste buds by venturing out for the day to one of the nearby wine farms or relax on the estate & take in some of the wonderful views Clouds Estate has to offer.

Clouds Estate boasts 7 rooms & 7 villas, each equipped with an en-suite bathroom & air-conditioning.
7 Contemporary rooms are light & spacious in design, decorated with carefully chosen furniture to enhance the building’s modern feel.  The highlight of each room is the floor-to-ceiling glass panes that invite guests to sit back, relax & enjoy the marvellous views.  All stylish rooms look out over the valley & in summer guests can appreciate this vista from sun loungers at the pool.  
The estate's designer villas are set in landscaped gardens and are surrounded by vineyards. The villas offer fantastic views from the lounge and balcony & are an ideal choice for families travelling with children or discerning guests who require the utmost privacy & space.
Communal areas include a cosy lounge, dining area & outdoor terrace with comfortable salas – the ideal spot to relax by the pool with a good book while soaking up the sun.

title: DELAIRE GRAFF ESTATE
description:
Delaire Graff Estate is ideally located on the Helshoogte Mountain pass overlooking the Stellenbosch valley.  This prestigious estate boasts luxurious suites with private decks & pools, stylish interiors & contemporary décor.
Without a doubt, one of the top wine estates in South Africa, Delaire Graff never fails to impress.  It made has won numerous awards & is a proud member of the luxurious group, Relais & Chateaux.
Discerning guests staying at Delaire Graff will have their choice from 2 prestigious restaurants on the estate & personalized wine tasting is standard here. 
With beautiful gardens, an impressive art collection & spectacular views, Delaire provides only the best in Winelands luxury.

The estate offers 5-star living in a variety of luxurious lodges, all of which feature double-volume ceilings, custom-designed furniture, & spectacular vineyard & mountain views.  
A total of 16 lodges include 4 garden facing deluxe lodges, 4 vineyard facing luxury lodges, 6 family-friendly superior lodges & 2 vineyard facing presidential lodges, each equipped with 2 bedrooms.
Each lodge has a private, heated infinity pool, a butler’s kitchen & an en-suite bathroom with a separate shower, bath & double vanities.  
Delaire Graff boasts a relaxing lounge & dining area, sparkling swimming pool, cocktail bar, spa & gym.

title: FRANSCHHOEK COUNTRY HOUSE
description:
Located on the outskirts of the charming village of Franschhoek, the luxurious Franschhoek Country House & Villas offer sublime cuisine & fine South African wines.  
An ideal base from which to explore the Winelands, this country house’s elegant suites & villas will take you back in time to an era of romance & sophistication.
Surrounded by spectacular mountains, vineyards & gardens decorated with lemon trees & fountains, one cannot help but feel relaxed & in awe of the beauty that is Franschhoek.

There is a wide selection of rooms at Franschhoek Country House, including 6 standard rooms, 5 luxury rooms, 2 garden cottages & 12 villas.  
The original manor house, dating back to 1890, is still used to accommodate guests in standard rooms.  Each standard room has a small lounge area with a private balcony overlooking the garden.  
Slightly apart from the manor house, one can find the luxury rooms.  These rooms offer a separate lounge area, a fireplace & underfloor heating as well as a private patio or balcony with beautiful views over the lavender-filled gardens & water fountains. 
The 2-bedroom garden cottages are ideal for families travelling with young children.  The downstairs main bedroom has an en suite bathroom & private patio, & the upstairs area has a spacious lounge with a fold-out bed for the kids.  These rooms also offer a balcony with gorgeous views over the vineyards.
The opulent villas offer a spacious lounge, in-room dining service, fireplace & private balcony.  
Communal areas include a restaurant, cocktail bar, gym, swimming pool & wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.

title: GRAND DEDALE COUNTRY HOUSE
description:
The scenic & secluded Grand Dedale Country House is set along a dirt road at the foot of the Bainskloof Pass on Doolhof, a working wine estate close to the Winelands town of Wellington.
This elegant retreat is surrounded by mountains & forests, offering guests a rural elegance a mere hour’s drive from the vibrant city of Cape Town.
Here, guests are treated like royalty – from opulent suites & relaxing spa treatments to high tea buffets & 4-course dinners prepared with locally sourced ingredients.  Romantic picnic basket lunches can also be arranged for guests wishing to get closer to nature, or perhaps visit one of the mountain viewpoints.
Grand Dedale will connect you with nature.  A wide selection of outdoor activities is available, including hiking, biking & fishing as well as horse riding.

Guests will have their pick between 6 individually styled rooms & a double volume honeymoon cottage.
The rooms are located within the main manor house while the beautifully restored 1707 cottage stands quietly amid the paddocks & gardens, ensuring guests have the utmost privacy.
Communal areas at Grand Dedale include a lounge & dining space, a cosy well-stocked library & a large deck with swimming pool & sun loungers.  There is also a wellness spa & gym.

title: GRANDE ROCHE
description:
Nestled at the foot of the magnificent Paarl Rock, is a boutique hotel like no other.  Grande Roche is a celebrated historical monument turned 5-star hotel, boasting beautiful gardens & excellent cuisine.
With spectacular views over endless vineyards & mountains, Grande Roche offers guests a scenic & secluded Winelands experience.
The vibrant city of Cape Town is only an hour’s drive away & just around the corner, you will find the charming towns of Franschhoek & Stellenbosch, along with world-class restaurants & golf courses.
Grande Roche offers an ideal base from which to explore the Cape Winelands & can easily be combined with a holiday to Cape Town & the Whale Coast.

Accommodation comprises 18 terrace suites, 5 heritage suites, 5 legacy rooms & 1 garden suite.
The terrace suites are built in the original Cape colonial style with thatched roofs, shutters & trailing vines over the private outdoor terrace.  Each terrace suite features a lounge with beautiful views.  
The old slave quarters on the estate have been turned into heritage suites, each boasting a spacious lounge & an upstairs bedroom with views across the gardens.  These suites are suitable for families since extra beds can be made up in the lounge.
The charmingly restored coast & carriage houses have been converted into legacy rooms, each containing a spacious lounge / bedroom with a  semi-private garden terrace & magnificent views of the Drakenstein mountains.
The garden suite features a separate lounge, small courtyard & private rooftop terrace.
Communal areas include a lounge & dining space, swimming pool, bar & gym.

title: LA CLE DES MONTAGNES
description:
La Cle des Montagne offers luxurious villa-style living in the heart of the Franschhoek valley in the Cape Winelands District.  
Sophisticated, stylish & breathtakingly beautiful – these opulent villas & suites are located on a working wine estate, surrounded by picturesque vineyards, plum orchards & spectacular mountains.
La Cle is the ideal destination for the discerning traveller who is after an intimate & luxurious villa experience.  The villas offer an idyllic setting a short stroll from the historic village of Franschhoek, with its award-winning restaurants, cafes & art galleries.

Consisting of 2 properties in 2 different locations, La Cle gives guests the choice of staying at The Village or The Lodge.
The Village is home to 4 villas (Grange, Manoir, Galerie & Colonial), while The Lodge is split into 5 rooms, boasting captivating views of the Franschhoek Valley.
Guests can book all accommodation on a per-room or exclusive-use basis (apart from the Galerie villa, which can only be booked exclusively.)  
Each of The Village’s 4 elegant villas has been individually styled & comes complete with an interactive kitchen, a lounge & dining room as well as an outdoor deck area with a swimming pool.
La Cle Lodge offers expansive views, a tennis court, putt & chip lawn & helipad.

title: LA RESIDENCE
description:
Situated on a private wine & olive estate in the picturesque Franschhoek valley, lies La Residence – an opulent French-inspired residence with beautifully designed suites, generous dining, private butler, chef & chauffeur services.
The award-winning La Residence estate overlooks a spectacular mountain range & is surrounded by lush vineyards, the idyllic location to appreciate some of Franschhoek’s most beautiful scenery.  
This fertile valley & the charming village of Franschhoek have become world-famous for fine wine, superb cuisine & exceptional service.

La Residence boasts 11 suites & 5 vineyard suites, each individually decorated with treasures such as fine French antiques & Persian rugs.  
Each suite offers a lounge area, balcony or terrace as well as an elegant bathroom with a large bath, double basins, a romantic sunken bath & stunning views of the surrounding Franschhoek valley.  
The suites are ideal for couples & the vineyard suites are the perfect choice for families travelling with children.
The main area comprises an indoor lounge area, library, outdoor terrace dining area overlooking the mountains, a sparkling pool with sun loungers & comfortable outdoor sofas where guests can relax while soaking up the sun.

title: LANZERAC HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
The Lanzerac Hotel & Spa is nestled in the leafy & tranquil Winelands neighbourhood of Stellenbosch, one of South Africa’s gourmet food capitals.
The hotel is set on a 155-hectare working wine estate where endless views of rolling vineyards & majestic mountains are an everyday occurrence.
Arguably Lanzerac’s most renowned feature – a luxurious hydro spa with a heated pool as well as private steam & sauna rooms - will ensure that guests are relaxed & rejuvenated.
Culinary feasts can be enjoyed at the hotels’ 2 on-site restaurants & delicious pre-dinner drinks are served at the Whisky & Cigar Bar.

Lanzerac boasts 53 world-class rooms, a royal pool suite & a presidential suite – all of which come with en-suite facilities, a private patio & air-conditioning.
After a day of exploration & wine tasting, guests can relax at the heated swimming pool, get a relaxing treatment at the wellness spa or work up a sweat at their on-site gym.  
The hotel’s 2 restaurants & bar offer world-class food & drinks in a relaxed, yet elegant setting.

title: LE FRANSCHHOEK HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Le Franschhoek Hotel & Spa boasts a scenic setting on a mountain-side estate in the stunning Franschhoek valley – the heartbeat of the Cape Winelands.
This Alpine-style region is located only an hour’s drive from the vibrant city of Cape Town, making Le Franschhoek an ideal choice for a classic Winelands experience.
Just around the corner, you will find some of South Africa’s best restaurants as well as superb wine estates, art galleries & boutique stores in & around town.  
Outdoor enthusiasts will have their pick from a range of exciting activities, including mountain biking, hiking or fly fishing.  Some of the Western Cape’s best golf courses are only a short drive away.
Their conservatory-style restaurant, Le Verger, serves excellent cuisine in a magical garden-style setting & the hotel is home to a variety of facilities, including a wellness spa, gym, tennis court & 2 swimming pools.

Accommodation comprises 79 rooms & suites, set against the backdrop of towering mountains & manicured gardens.  
These include classic rooms, deluxe rooms, suites & villas, all equipped with air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.  Some of these rooms can sleep 4 guests, so are ideal for families.
Classic rooms are located within easy reach of the hotel amenities while the deluxe rooms offer added luxuries & space.  The suites boast private balconies with beautiful views of the mountains & the villas include a lounge, patio & kitchenette.  
Hotel facilities include a lounge & cocktail bar, 2 restaurants, 2 swimming pools, a spa, a gym, a tennis court & a dedicated Kids Club.

title: LE QUARTIER FRANCAIS
description:
Le Quartier Francais is set within beautiful gardens in the heart of Franschhoek – the very heartbeat of the Cape Winelands & the gourmet capital of South Africa.
This charming & luxurious boutique hotel is centrally located on the village’s main street & within walking distance to many shops, boutiques, galleries & restaurants.
Le Quartier provides an incomparable culinary destination, award-winning gourmet dining and wine list that is matched only by the contemporary luxury of the exclusive rooms and suites.
Guests can experience some of the most exquisite fine-dining cuisine on the planet at Chef Charne Sampson’s Epice (previously sous chef at La Colombe) or at Protégé, a casual-style eatery under the guidance of Scot Kirton.
Within walking distance, you will find an array of award-winning restaurants, cafes, boutiques & art galleries.

Set in beautiful gardens, all rooms & suites are individually decorated in luxurious fabrics & furnishings.  Accommodation comprises auberge rooms, grande rooms, petite garden suites & 2 pool suites.
Auberge rooms include a spacious seating area & offer views over the courtyard, pool or mountains while the double volume grande rooms are ideal for honeymooners as they are perfectly appointed, with absolute privacy in mind.  
The petite garden suites overlook the garden & feature large sliding doors that open onto a private patio.  Alternatively, the pool suites are each equipped with a private swimming pool & walled garden, ensuring only the best in Winelands luxury.
Communal areas include a lounge, a bar & a sparkling swimming pool.

title: LEEU ESTATES
description:
Leeu Estates Franschhoek is set on 100 hectares of vineyards, landscaped gardens & fynbos within the heart of the Cape Winelands – the culinary capital of the country.
Tucked away between the mountainside & river, just minutes away from the village of Franschhoek, Leeu Estates is the ideal setting for an elegant & sophisticated hideaway.
A short stroll away, you will find a variety of award-winning restaurants, boutiques, cafes & spectacular wine farms.

Leeu Estates is a refurbished 19th-century Manor House with 6 rooms & suites.  There are 2 rooms adjacent to the Manor House & the remaining rooms & suites are located in spacious cottages among the gardens & vineyards.
At the centre of the estate, you will find the Bokkie Garden – a special place to the founder of Leeu Estates.  The Afrikaans word “bokkie” means small buck, but is also a term used by South Africans, comparable to “sweetheart.” Here in the Bokkie Garden, guests can recharge & reconnect with nature.
The estate also boasts a luxurious spa & a hair salon as well as a pool, a gym & 2 restaurants: 
le Chêne and La Petite Colombe – both located on the estate & producing food that reflects the region’s excellent culinary reputation.

title: LEEU HOUSE
description:
Leeu House is an exclusive 5-star boutique hotel boasting an idyllic setting in the heart of the scenic Franschhoek valley: South Africa’s best culinary destination.
This sophisticated & private hideaway offers superb comfort, individually-styled rooms & exceptional service.  
Franschhoek is South Africa’s gourmet capital & since Leeu House is located within a quiet oasis on Franschhoek’s vibrant main street, guests will be steps away from world-class dining, cafes, boutiques & art galleries.
The boutique hotel offers guests delicious farm-style artisanal breakfasts, complemented with leisurely meals in The Conservancy, or al fresco on the terrace.

Small & intimate, Leeu House boasts only 12 rooms, categorized as follow: 4 classic rooms, 2 deluxe rooms, 4 classic terrace rooms & 2 deluxe terrace rooms.
The classic rooms offer easy access to the lounge, Conservatory & pool areas whereas the deluxe rooms are larger – one is situated on the ground floor & the other on the first floor with lovely mountain views.  
The classic terrace rooms offer views of either the pool or mountains & can accommodate 2 children in a double bed or twin sofa beds.  The deluxe terrace rooms both have terraces & a double sofa bed that can sleep 2 children.
Main areas include a comfortable lounge & dining space, a restaurant & a sparkling swimming pool.

title: LIGHT HOUSE BOUTIQUE SUITES
description:
The Light House Boutique Suites is a privately owned, exclusive & opulent boutique guest house set in the heart of the historic town of Paarl in the Cape Winelands.  
Here, guests will be able to enjoy warm, professional & friendly hospitality, superb wines & delicious cuisine.
The Light House Boutique Suites provides a home-away-from-home experience, without compromising on the everyday luxuries.  An intimate, personal encounter with some of the Winelands’ most fabulous hosts, guests will feel right at home the moment they walk through the door.
Off -the-beaten-track, The Light House Boutique Suites is, without a doubt, the Winelands’ best-kept secret.   The beautiful Paarl valley is home to breathtaking views, superb food & wine, rich history & interesting shops.

Accommodation at The Light House consists of 5 luxurious suites, each individually decorated & tastefully furnished.   
This was personally navigated down to the last detail with bespoke furniture, soft furnishings, luxurious fabrics, Egyptian cotton bed linen & objet d’art.
The main area consists of an elegant dining room, comfortable lounge area, well-stocked library, outside terrace overlooking the garden & a large swimming pool.
